text: Cyrtolitidae is an extinct family of monoplacophorans in the order Cyrtonellida. == Genera == * Cloudia * Cyclocyrtonella * Cyrtolites * Cyrtonellopsis * Kolihadiscus * Neocyrtolites * Paracyrtolites * Quasisinuites * Sinuella * Sinuitopsina * Sinuitopsis * Telamocornu * Yochelsonellis == References == == External links == * Category:Prehistoric monoplacophorans Category:Prehistoric mollusc families Category:Ordovician first appearances Category:Devonian extinctions
title: Cyrtolitidae
